Body: Possible Duplicate:  Move paid apps between devices?  My contract is getting close to finishing so I'll be upgrading to a new Android phone and giving my old phone to a family member.When I move my Google account across to my new phone will I have to repurchase or just re-download my paid for apps?Also will I'll have to remove the paid for apps from my old phone before it is associated with a new Google account?
Title: Reinstalling purchased apps on a new phone?

history.Text: My contract is getting close to finishing so I'll be upgrading to a new Android phone and giving my old phone to a family member.When I move my Google account across to my new phone will I have to repurchase or just re-download my paid for apps?Also will I'll have to remove the paid for apps from my old phone before it is associated with a new Google account?
Reinstalling purchased apps on a new phone?

> **Possible Duplicate:**  > [Move paid apps between devices?](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/7099/move-paid-apps-between-devices)  My contract is getting close to finishing so I'll be upgrading to a new Android phone and giving my old phone to a family member.When I move my Google account across to my new phone will I have to repurchase or just re-download my paid for apps?Also will I'll have to remove the paid for apps from my old phone before it is associated with a new Google account?
